fulltext:
Page 1/3 
Vo Minh Thong (Mr.) 
Solution Architecture Mobile 
Summary  
A software developer for over 7+ years, I have worked on Objective C and Swift based projects 
for over 6 years and 1 year for manager project. 
I am good at object-oriented and functional programming. I try to learn something new 
everyday. I often try to bring these skills into my daily teamwork. Even though teamwork is a natural 
skill to me, I often find myself doing my own researches at late night to tackle some challenging 
problems. That’s my way of self-improvement.  
Education 
Graduation: 
- 
2010 – 2013: Software Engineer – University Of Science. 
- 
07/2012: Starting iOS Development 
Technical Skills 
- 
Xcode & Interface Builder 
- 
ObjC, Swift, Nodejs, Javascript, PHP 
- 
Building to Devices 
- 
Distributing an App (preferably for an app on the App Store) 
- 
Fluency with Swift OR Objective-C 
- 
UIKit, Auto Layout 
- 
Debugging in Xcode 
- 
Instruments 
- 
Xib’s, Storyboards, Segues and related presentation/transition 
- 
Core Data, Cocoa Touch 
- 
Core Graphics, OpenGL, Metal, GLSL.  
- 
Design Patterns Swift/ ObjC 
- 
REST and/or SOAP 
- 
Git, Subversion or other version control 
- 
Understanding of Clean Coding Principles 
- 
Understanding of SOLID 
- 
Threading and Concurrency 
- 
Have built for both iPhone and iPad, ideally in a universal app 
- 
Payment: Stripe, Braintree, Paybox
